turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good afternoon, I was hoping to place a Bella Luna pick up order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good afternoon. sure, let's place the order. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I had a hankering for thick-crust pizza. So, can I get three large meat lovers pizzas with the thick crust, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, you want 3 large meat lovers pizzas with thick crust. the total will be $45.29.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order for you. i'll be ready in 45 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's what That order is the only thing I needed this afternoon. Thank you very much for your very gracious help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that's awesome, i'm glad to help you get your pizza needs taken care of.
